info.name: Cookie Clicker - Micro Buildings list
info.description: Changes height of every building to save space, so you don't have to scroll in a Cookie Clicker game. Use when you have low screen resolution and want to see full building list. Compatible with 2.031
info.additionalInfo: Also check my other styles for changing building list size: Cookie Clicker - Smaller Buildings List Cookie Clicker - No Store Header
